p: Principal coordinate analysis (PCO) was performed using the PCO component of PAST 1.94b (Hammer et al. 2009) to visualize the grouping of samples into clusters. For the PCO analysis, principal components were extracted from a distance matrix produced using the Jaccard ( 1901) similarity coefficient for binary data. PCO scatter plots were computed showing the clustering of all individuals and the clustering of individuals from the soil cores only.
